meanings.definition: Having or producing a lot of torque.
meanings.sent1: The torquey engine easily pulled the heavy load up the hill.
meanings.sent2: The torquey motorbike accelerated quickly from a standstill.
meanings.sent3: The torquey drill made drilling through the wall seem like a breeze.
meanings.sent4: Her torquey grip on the steering wheel guided the car smoothly around the corner.
meanings.sent5: The torquey wrench effortlessly loosened the stubborn bolt.

meanings.definition: Characterized by a high level of torque.
meanings.sent1: The torquey truck was perfect for towing trailers.
meanings.sent2: The torquey sports car hugged the curves of the race track.
meanings.sent3: The torquey lawnmower made mowing the lawn surprisingly fun.
meanings.sent4: His torquey arms easily lifted the heavy box.
meanings.sent5: The torquey machine churned out power with ease.

meanings.sent1: The torquey tool effortlessly tightened the screws.
meanings.sent2: The torquey generator provided power during the blackout.
meanings.sent3: The torquey robot arm efficiently moved heavy objects.
meanings.sent4: The torquey windmill spun gracefully in the breeze.
meanings.sent5: The torquey engine roared to life with a powerful hum.
